attributes.action: investigate the role of newspapers particularly the Daily Mail and its campaign to undermine public confidence in the MMR jab especially their failure to report at publication positive results relating to the vaccine. To also ascertain if families failed to give their children the jab because of their reports/comments and if so the paper to be subject to a financial penalty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Press Complaints Commission.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
